description: Length of n-th run of digit 0 in A003137.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (group)a030336 n = a030336_list !! (n-1)a030336_list = map length $ filter ((== 0) . head) $ group a003137_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 21 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
